Description: Production supervisor (food industry)Roles and ResponsibilitiesThe key roles and responsibilities include:·        Train, supervise and manage the production team·        Set and schedule the production plan in alignment with the annual and seasonal sales forecasts·        Set the production guidelines and standards and resolve any production issues·        Identify the types of products and specifications of each product (i.e. quality, quantity, size, packaging material)·        Identify the production recipe/equation of each product·        Receive orders and adjust the production plan when required based on the priority and urgency of each order·        Monitor the efficiency of the production lines to ensure timely loading and shipments·        Ensure adherence to ISO and HSE as well as company quality standards of each type of product·        Coordinate with the Maintenance Supervisor to resolve any technical issues or machinery breakdown·        Create and update the products list, and identify ideas for potential new products based on the production observations ·        Monitor the input and output quantities of production materials, identify variances and resolve any pertaining issues in collaboration with the Wafra Factory Manager ·        Manage returned/wrong orders as well as waste control·        Ensure accuracy of the entered production data on the system before it is forwarded to the Finance Department (i.e. Accounts and Costing and Inventory) on a daily basis and delegate the data entry to his/her subordinates·        Ensure maintenance of highest standards of professional conduct, ethics and integrity in provision of the services·        Any other relevant work assigned by the department managerSkills
Skills:
·        Diploma or Bachelor’s Degree (Preferred) in a relevant field
·        +7 years of relevant experience
·        Proficient user of Microsoft Word, PowerPoint and Excel and relevant software applications
·        Experience in using various types of production machinery and equipment
·        Professional certifications (Preferred)
Knowledge of ISO Standards
